refnamediv.refpurpose: Tool for placing and editing tips along the plotted 2D curves.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: With this tool, it is possible to place, move and modify tips on the 2D curves. This can be done by program or interactively. The commonly used mode is the interactive one:

Once the datatips mode has been enabled by datatipToggle(), a simple left click on a curve will add a tip ( a small box with informations on the current point) at the nearest datapoint of the curve. Each time one left click on a curve a new tip is added.
To move a tip, press left button on the small square mark on the curve and (slowly) drag it to the desired location.
Clicking outside all the curves will erase all the tips already set.
Right click on the tip mark opens a contextual dialog. This dialog allows in particular to customize the information displayed in all the datatips of the associated curve.
Middle click on the tip mark opens a contextual dialog taht allows to manage the orientation of the selected tip.
